name: START.BUILD.GROW: The Entrepreneurs Weekend
overview:
Start.Build.Grow organises events to help entrepreneurs with a big vision accelerate their success by offering them the opportunity to learn directly from experienced founders, investors and leading business experts in key business areas with the aim of giving them concrete action steps they can use to propel their business to massive success.

Start.Build.Grow will hold its first entrepreneurs weekend in london, UK on 4th & 5th with more planned. It is expected that 250 attendees will descend on london to put their business in the hot seat and create action plans designed to allow them to to take massive leaps with their ideas.

The aim of Start.Build.Grow is to enable entrepreneurs who want to build big companies to acquire the knowledge & experience they need to achieve massive success from founder and investors who have done it before.

On the first day attendees will have the opportunity to access 12 intensive masterclasses in key business areas. On the second day successful founders and investors will reveal their stories and lessons learnt. After these presentations entrepreneurs take the hot seat and pitch their business to the founders and investors and receive in-depth feedback and analysis.

Throughout the weekend the focus is on action, so that all delegates can leave with tangible business advice they can use in their businesses immediately with real success.
